/usr/local/cuda-12.4/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --expt-relaxed-constexpr -O3 -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/run_simulation.dir/deviceObjects1 -o CMakeFiles/run_simulation.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/run_simulation.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp
